title: Kreation Organic Kafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small and casual cafe and juice bar. Menu features breakfast omelets, cold & hot tapas served with bread, and salads, in addition to organic coffee, teas, and selection of juices. Uses mostly local farmers market produce. Sidewalk seating and back patio community table. Prices moderate to slightly more expensive (for dinner).
